name: react-autowhatever
description: Accessible rendering layer for Autosuggest and Autocomplete components

scripts.start: mkdir -p demo/dist && npm run copy-static-files && node server
scripts.lint: eslint src test demo/src demo/standalone/app.js server.js webpack.*.js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src -d dist
scripts.demo-dist: rm -rf demo/dist && mkdir demo/dist && npm run copy-static-files && webpack --config webpack.gh-pages.config.js
scripts.build: npm run dist && npm run standalone
scripts.gh-pages-build: npm run prebuild && npm run demo-dist
scripts.prepublish: npm run dist && npm run standalone

# React Autowhatever

Accessible rendering layer for Autosuggest and Autocomplete components.

## Demo

Check out the [Homepage](http://react-autowhatever.js.org) and the [Codepen examples](http://codepen.io/collection/nmZqgW).

## Installation

```shell
yarn add react-autowhatever
```

or

```shell
npm install react-autowhatever --save
```

## Related

* [react-autosuggest](https://github.com/moroshko/react-autosuggest) - WAI-ARIA compliant React autosuggest component
